alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clinton and northwestern Grand Isle Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1143 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alburgh. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Heavy rainfall rates near an inch per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding on roadways will be possible. Locations impacted include... Alburgh Village, Rouses Point, Alburgh, Champlain, Isle La Motte, Windmill Point, Reynolds Point, King Bay, Blanchard Bay, Mud Point, Chazy Landing, Catfish Point, Scales Point, Catfish Bay In Clinton County, Kelly Bay, Point Au Fer and Burying Yard Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
